metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3545 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability was found in the virtio vhost-userGPU device (vhost-user-gpu) of QEMU in versions up to and including 6.0.The flaw exists in virgl_cmd_get_capset_info() incontrib/vhost-user-gpu/virgl.c and could occur due to the read ofuninitialized memory. A malicious guest could exploit this issue to leakmemory from the host.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
